content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Munich to be a great place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment seems to be in a very convenient location, and I appreciate the effort you've put into maintaining it. However, as a student, I'm on a tight budget. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the fact that the apartment is unfurnished and also takes into account my financial situation as a student. Would you be willing to negotiate the price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Of course, Farhad. I understand that students often have limited funds. Let's find a price that works for both of us. How much were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I was hoping to find a place that fits within my budget of 800 Euros per month, including all utilities. Is this something we can discuss?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Farhad, I'm sorry, but 800 Euros per month is much lower than my asking price. I'm looking for a tenant who can afford to pay at least 1200 Euros per month, which is a fair price considering the location and the amenities nearby. Is there any way you can increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While 1200 Euros per month is more than I initially had in mind, I'm willing to consider it if there are additional benefits or if the price can be adjusted in some way. What other terms could we discuss to make the arrangement more favorable for me?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Farhad, let's see if we can find a middle ground. How about this: if you are willing to pay 1000 Euros per month, I will include all utilities in that price. That way, you have a fixed cost each month, and you don't have to worry about fluctuating utility bills. Would this be more acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 1000 Euros per month including all utilities is more attractive. It simplifies my budgeting and takes away some of the financial stress. I'm willing to negotiate further, but let's start with this offer. Would you be open to discussing any additional perks or discounts if I'm willing to pay this amount?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Farhad, I'm glad to hear that you find my offer more acceptable. As for additional perks or discounts, I could consider providing you with a one-time discount of 200 Euros on your first month's rent if you sign a one-year lease agreement. This would show your commitment to staying longer, and in return, you get a reduced rate to start. Does this sound like a good deal to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of a one-time discount of 200 Euros on the first month's rent, in addition to the 1000 Euros per month including all utilities, is very appealing. It reduces my upfront costs and provides me with a stable monthly expense. I'm willing to sign a one-year lease agreement under these terms. I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month with the additional discount for the first month. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
